properties.Name: PaymentCardBalance
properties.Description: A payment card balance refers to the amount owed.

Columns.Name: PaymentCardId
Columns.Description:
Primary Account Number (PAN) = The number that is embossed, encoded, or both, on a plastic card that identifies the issuer and the particular cardholder account.

The account number on the card, which is unique to every cardholder. The card number is used to identify the purchaser for authorization and billing purposes.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp of the associated payment card balance.
